description: This Sicilian inspired pasta dish is enhanced further with the addition of aromatic, fresh dill.
keywords: Seafood pasta,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Zesty Tuna Spaghettini Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 425g John West Tuna in Olive Oil Blend, drained and oil reserved
2 pinches parmesan cheese, finely shredded (for serving)

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pasta following packet directions. Drain and keep pasta hot.
Heat olive oil and reserved John West Tuna oil in a non stick frypan over medium heat. Add capers and cook for 1 minute. Add garlic and cook until fragrant, but not coloured.

Add hot pasta, flaked John West Tuna, dill, finely grated lemon zest, and spinach, cook stirring gently for a further 1-2 minutes until heated and spinach has wilted. Adjust ‘sauciness’ with lemon juice, if desired.
Served topped with parmesan cheese and cracked pepper.
